entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't copy additional files when ReferenceOutputAssembly=false for exe references #23420
  • With .NET 7 SDK, create razor project failed with error when running PerfView #23410

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 6.0.2xx to the 6.0.102 version of the SDK #23423
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Better caching for RazorSourceGenerator when SuppressRazorSourceGener… #23419
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23411
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.2xx] Update man pages #23351
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update man pages #23350
    Servicing-approved
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 6.0.1xx
  • Upgrade Test Platform and fix tests #23409
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23404
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [release/6.0.2xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
